name: Just an Experiment
description:
You're quietly trying to uncover the secret of this world. You think you might be onto something. But Dr. Baggs is onto YOU.

There are several choices to make, but only one ending.

Credits

Megalosomnia - Megalommi

Voice Acting (Dr. Baggs, General Papyrus) - Davetastic Dave

Sprites, Backgrounds, Programming, Writing - DerpyChoCho

Content Warning Details

This visual novel contains moments where the player character is hypnotized and persuaded with suggestions.

This VN is not suitable for those adverse to flashing lights or sudden camera movements. But there is the ability to turn off visual effects in the accessibility menu.

There are moments where things can get very sensual between Dr. Baggs and the player. However, this can be avoided by not pressing the "Flirt" button. In other words, the player must initiate any sensual moments so Dr. Baggs reciprocates.

There is no sexually explicit content, but there are descriptions of heated making out.

Dev Notes

I don't normally delve into Undertale AUs. But Mmi's AU gave me an idea on how to experiment with some new mechanics in Ren'Py. So I made this super short VN to test things out! Hence the double meaning of the VN title.  :)

Also, if you haven't seen the credits...
... you haven't seen everything.
